R.V.R. & J.C. College of Engineering (RVRJC) stands for Rayapati Venkata Ranga Rao & Jagarlamudi Chandramouli College of Engineering.

🏫 It is an autonomous institution established in 1985 and is affiliated to **Acharya Nagarjuna University**.

🎖️ RVRJC is accredited by **NAAC with an A+ Grade** and its programs are NBA accredited.

It’s one of the most reputed engineering colleges in Andhra Pradesh, known for academic excellence, placements, and infrastructure.
I’m your virtual assistant for RVR & JC College. Ask me anything about admissions, courses, fees, and more!

🎓 Admissions Made Easy!
You can join our college through **EAMCET**, **JEE Mains**, or via the **Management quota**.
